reviews.review: It's a fun skill-based game. Once you got the basic mechanics down it starts to get fun. It can be very annoying to play against cheaters. There are also a lot of toxic people, if you can accept those things the game is fun and I would actually recommend it.
The game is realy good, but there are some cheaters.
